page.title: 08RIDGE LANE & BIRCHLEY HEATH
page.content:
{Ridge Lane}is a small village with about 200 houses. There is a Council Estate of houses and flats. On the main street the houses are privately owned. There is one Public House called the{'White Hart'}and one{General {stores. }There is a park with a slide and a swing. In the main street there is a{Methodist Church}which has services every Sunday.
{Birchley Heath}is a very small village. There are 64 houses built in terraces. There is a{General Stores which also serves as a{sub Post {Office. }There is a recreation ground with swings,slides and roundabout.
